snippet: Two of Denmark’s leading players, Hans-Kristian Vittinghus and Kim Astrup, told the Badminton World Federation that they were invited to conspire with others to fix matches.
lead_paragraph: Two of Denmark’s leading players, Hans-Kristian Vittinghus and Kim Astrup, told the Badminton World Federation that they were invited to conspire with others to fix matches.

headline.main: Two Danish Badminton Players Report a Fixing Invitation
headline.print_headline: Two Denmark Players Report a Fixing Invitation
